amendment.description: Amendment affirms the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to allow private entities to connect to and store helium in the Federal Helium Reserve for an appropriate fee.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 113-47 to affirm the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to allow private entities to connect to and store helium in the Federal Helium Reserve for an appropriate fee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
